page.title: 13CRAIGENDARROCH DEVELOPMENT
page.content:
Craigendarroch Hotel & Country Club
This is a new development brought into Ballater and Upper Deeside.It involves a hotel which has been refurbished. It is named after the Craigendarroch hill where it is placed.There is also a luxury country club with a swimming pool, spa bath, games room, snooker room, trimnasium, health & beauty salon, squash courts and a ski slope. At 450-500 people the local membership is now full. To maintain high standards it is thought wise not to use it as a community centre.The majority of staff employed are local.Some difficulty was experienced in finding accommodation for incoming staff. Local opposition to the development is still a talking point in the village.
